The base to be used as a reference for calculating the performance is CPI, less the costs incurred in terms of the series in question. The company must maintain a beta whose value ranges between 0.95 and 1.05 units, between the CPI and its share price, considering the effect last hundred observations.

PRINRVAA.MX.summary: The Fund will invest primarily in shares of Mexican companies in a direct way, through partnerships and investment vehicles that replicate the behavior of Mexican equity indices (non-leveraged ETFs whose underlying will be consistent with the Fund's investment regime and are registered in the national registry of values or in the SIC of the Bolsa Mexicana de Valores).
